DOC.brief_title: Identification Null Allelic Variant CYP2C8 In A Korean Population
DOC.detailed_description: Whole blood sample 50 unrelated Korean subject genotyped 3kb 5 ' upstream region , exon-intron boundary , exon , UTR region CYP2C8 gene direct sequencing . Genotyping CYP2C8 address null allelic variant , CYP2C8*11 use pyrosequencing 447 Koreans , 93 African-Americans , 100 Caucasians , 348 Chineses 100 Vietnameses . Then , in-vivo single PK study CYP2C8 probe , rosiglitazone ( 4mg ) , conduct 7 healthy subject CYP2C8*1/*1 2 CY2C8*1/*11 .
